function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lockdowns and social distancing impacting construction companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bankruptcy for engineering and construction companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for homes with dedicated office spaces due to remote work","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal space and outdoor spaces in current housing stock","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased remote working leading to prolonged indoor exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monetization of housing leading to overcrowding and substandard living conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in housing interior trends towards healthier and touch-free technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Blurring lines between work and home life could lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within households","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technology-facilitated real-time residential management could lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases if not implemented with appropriate health and safety protocols","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in homebuyer preferences and housing locations due to covid-19 could lead to spread of contagious diseases in new residential areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased density in urban areas due to the need for affordable housing. this could lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortages of affordable housing for low-income people and families","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in road traffic flows and major cities experiencing drops in rush-hour traffic congestion","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased investment in energy efficiency and retrofitting of buildings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of infection in cities due to close contact in vulnerable households, construction sites, and local businesses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for cultural resources, municipal services, and participation may lead to increased virtual interactions and dependence","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential long-term coexistence with covid-19 leading to ongoing public health concerns and the need for sustainable recovery strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups such as the elderly, women, the poor, and migrants disproportionately affected by pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shift towards digital life and remote work","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Changing trust in local authorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis-response measures may discourage expansion and maintenance of housing stock, leading to barriers restricting mobility and impacting financial and economic resilience","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cities may suffer different consequences of the health crisis, impacting their recovery options and possibilities based on their trade openness, labor market structure, and industrial composition","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mortgage and rent payment suspensions in multiple countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Support measures for construction industry and utility bill payment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shift in living preferences leading to depopulation of large cities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of green and sustainable construction in the housing industry","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary research on the impact of housing policies on covid-19 spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of public health and safety infrastructure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor urban design and architecture contributing to disease propagation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of crises on sustainable development","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to restricted outdoor recreation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disruption to energy demand and supply due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for future waves of covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient readiness for waste and wastewater management in gbcss","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Undermined indoor environmental quality ieq in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"New designs of living spaces may not effectively address contagious disease propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sustainability rating methods may not adequately prioritize social and health aspects","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased demand for comfortable and high-quality housing due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic
